title: Incubus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, burst, killing and cleaning yourself. All players who visit you will be contaminated with your Eggs.
- While dead, on a full moon choose a player with your Eggs. You will deal an Unstoppable attack to them and revive.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players know if they have Eggs.
- After your first rebirth, you can now burst at someone else's house, infecting them and all their visitors with Eggs.
- If someone else kills a player with your Eggs that same night, you will not be able to rebirth through them.
- You can't Rebirth more than twice.

desc:
Post 5281
*The eggs lie dormant for decades. Microscopic, crawling through veins towards the brain. Once they begin to ripen, cluster headaches and aberrant behavior reign. The head explodes, blood-slick manidble eels emerging. They feed on rodents, inserting themselves through any orifice - prey is absorbed from the inside out - each time they grow new, larger limbs with new senses. After a bloody cycle, they burst themselves, releasing their eggs. The eggs can be detected. They cannot be removed.*
